benchmark_details.name: AI Idea Bench 2025
benchmark_details.overview: AI Idea Bench 2025 is a framework designed to quantitatively evaluate and compare the ideas generated by LLMs within the domain of AI research, addressing gaps in current assessments of idea generation.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To provide a systematic way to evaluate the effectiveness of idea generation methods in AI research.

data.source: 3,495 AI papers and their associated inspired works from AI-related conferences published after October 10, 2023.

methodology.calculation: Metrics are calculated based on the degree of alignment with original papers and reference material.
methodology.interpretation: Higher scores indicate better alignment with ground truth papers.
